snippet: Davey Johnson of the Nationals and Bob Melvin of the Athletics won Manager of the Year awards on Tuesday for their roles in leading their franchises to overdue playoff berths.
abstract: Washington Nationals manager Davey Johnson and Oakland Athletics manager Bob Melvin are named Major League Baseball's managers of the year; Johnson and Melvin each led their teams to division titles.
lead_paragraph: Davey Johnson of the Nationals and Bob Melvin of the Athletics won Manager of the Year awards on Tuesday for their roles in leading their franchises to overdue playoff berths.

headline.seo: Washington’s Davey Johnson and Oakland’s Bob Melvin Win Manager of the Year Awards
headline.main: Managers Who Ended Postseason Droughts Receive Honors
headline.print_headline: Managers Who Ended Postseason Droughts Receive Honors
